dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(game.getDayOfWeek()==DOW_SATURDAY || game.getDayOfWeek()==DOW_WEDNESDAY)

As you continue on your way through the market, you see that a large area in the very middle of the square has been cordoned off with wooden fences. Notice boards attached to this fencing reveal that today is a livestock market day, which is stating the obvious due to the fact that you're able to see for yourself the countless animals being bought, sold, and auctioned off within this fenced-off area.

#ELSE

Several games stalls have been set up here. Out of the dozen or so stalls, there are only two which really catch your interest; one offering a game of darts, and one that offers a strength test.

#ENDIF
Spend some time watching livestock being bought and sold.
Raccoon-girl tells you that you get three darts and have to hit the bullseye to win a prize. Costs 15 flames to have a go.
You decide against having a go at darts and turn around and leave. You wonder what to do next...

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_elis_market_darts_won))

#IF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_RANGED_WEAPON)>=66) You hit the bullseye on your first throw, then to show off you hit it again with the second and third darts. #ELSEIF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_RANGED_WEAPON)>=33) You hit the bullseye on your second throw, then to show off you hit it again with the third dart. #ELSE You manage to hit the bullseye on your third throw. #ENDIF

The raccoon-girl happily congratulates you and asks what prize you'd like.

#ELSE

#IF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_RANGED_WEAPON)>=66) You find yourself distracted by people around you, and so despite your considerable skill at using ranged weapons, you somehow manage to just miss the bullseye with all three darts. #ELSEIF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_RANGED_WEAPON)>=33) You find yourself distracted by people around you, and so despite your skill at using ranged weapons, you miss the bullseye with all three darts. #ELSE You miss the bullseye with all three darts. #ENDIF

The raccoon-girl says better luck next time and asks if you want to have another try.

#ENDIF
You ask for the chocolates. The raccoon-girl hands them over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.
You ask for the perfume. The raccoon-girl hands it over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.
You ask for the teddy bear. The raccoon-girl hands it over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.
You say that you want to get to know the raccoon-girl a little better as your prize, and suggest taking her for a coffee or snack. She agrees and closes the stall for 30 minutes.

You say that you don't want a prize. The raccoon-girl says that she has a rule that winners can't play again in the same day, but seeing as you aren't taking a prize, you can come back and play again later if you'd like.
You [pc.step] away from the stall and let the next person in line play, who also misses all of their shots. You wonder what to do next...
Horse-boy tells you that you get one hit to try and get the puck to hit the bell to win a prize. Costs 15 flames to have a go.
You decide against having a go at the strength tester and turn around and leave. You wonder what to do next...

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_elis_market_strength_won))

#IF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE)>=66) You hit the strength tester so hard that the puck flies up and smashes the bell into pieces. #ELSEIF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE)>=33) You hit the strength tester and cause the puck to fly up and whack into the bell with some force. #ELSE You hit the strength tester and just about manage to cause the puck to fly up and tap into the bell. #ENDIF

The horse-boy happily congratulates you and asks what prize you'd like.

#ELSE

#IF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE)>=66) You find yourself distracted by people around you, and so despite your considerable strength, you end up slightly missing the strength tester's strike pad. #ELSEIF(pc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE)>=33) You find yourself distracted by people around you, and so despite your strength, you end up slightly missing the strength tester's strike pad. #ELSE You hit the strike pad but the puck only flies half way up, leaving the bell unrung. #ENDIF

The horse-boy says better luck next time and asks if you want to have another go.

#ENDIF

You ask for the meat hamper. The horse-boy hands it over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.

You open the hamper to find some meat and a bottle of cider.
You ask for the wooden bat. The horse-boy hands it over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.
You ask for the metal bat. The horse-boy hands it over and says you can only win once a day, so if you want to play again, come back tomorrow.
You say that you want to get to know the horse-boy a little better as your prize, and suggest taking him for a coffee or snack. He agrees and closes the stall for 30 minutes.

You say that you don't want a prize. The horse-boy says that he has a rule that winners can't play again in the same day, but seeing as you aren't taking a prize, you can come back and play again later if you'd like.
You [pc.step] away from the stall and let the next person in line play, who also fails to hit the bell. You wonder what to do next...

#IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=19)

As it's well past closing time, all of the stalls in the Farmer's Market have been packed up and taken away. As a result, there's nothing for you to do here except head back into Elis...

#ELSE #IF(fae.isPlayerKnowsName()) #IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=18)

As it's past closing time, you see that Fae and Silvia are busily packing their stall away. Not wanting to trouble them, you decide to leave them to it and head back into the Farmer's Market...

#ELSE #IF(fae.isVisiblyPregnant())

#IF(!fae.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) You once again find yourself approaching the clothing stall, 'Rainbow's End'. Fae is the first to spot you as you draw near, and as you come to a halt in front of the counter, she points down to her swollen belly and declares, [fae.speech(Look, [pc.name], you got me knocked up!)] #ELSE You once again find yourself approaching the clothing stall, 'Rainbow's End'. Fae is the first to spot you as you draw near, and as you come to a halt in front of the counter, she points down at her rounded belly and declares, [fae.speech(Look, [pc.name], I'm still pregnant with our kids!)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF #IF(silvia.isVisiblyPregnant())

#IF(fae.isVisiblyPregnant()) Hearing her sister greet you, Silvia looks over at you and flashes you a big grin, before pointing down at her own pregnant bump and teasing, #ELSE You once again find yourself approaching the clothing stall, 'Rainbow's End'. Silvia is the first to spot you as you draw near, and as you come to a halt in front of the counter, she runs her hands over her pregnant bump and teases, #ENDIF #IF(!silvia.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) [silvia.speech(Look what you did, you naughty [pc.girl]... These are your kids in here...)] #ELSE [silvia.speech(I'm still carrying our kids around...)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF #IF(fae.isVisiblyPregnant())

#IF(silvia.isVisiblyPregnant()) The two pregnant sisters step up beside one another, and with their swollen bellies gently touching, Fae lets out a little laugh and asks, [fae.speech(So then, [pc.name], are you here to buy something?)] #ELSE Hearing her sister greet you, Silvia looks over at you and flashes you a big grin. Seeing her sister's reaction, Fae lets out a little laugh, before asking, [fae.speech(So then, [pc.name], are you here to buy something?)] #ENDIF

#ELSEIF(silvia.isVisiblyPregnant())

Hearing her sister greet you, Fae looks over at you and flashes you a big grin, before asking, [fae.speech(So then, [pc.name], are you here to buy something?)]

#ELSE

You once again find yourself approaching the clothing stall, 'Rainbow's End'. The foxtauress sisters, Fae and Silvia, are standing behind the counter, and as they see you approach Fae waves you over and calls out, [fae.speech([pc.Name]! Are you here to buy something?)]

#ENDIF #IF(pc.isVisiblyPregnant() && pc.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(fae))

#IF(!pc.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(fae)) At that moment, the two sisters suddenly notice that you're sporting a swollen, pregnant belly. Telling Fae that she's the one who knocked you up, you smile as the foxtauress teases, [fae.speech(It's not my fault; your pussy was just so good, I didn't want to pull out! Hey, are you wanting to buy some clothing for our kids?)] #ELSE At that moment, the two sisters look down at your swollen, pregnant belly. Knowing that she's the one who knocked you up, Fae smirks and teases, [fae.speech(Still carrying our kids around, huh? Hey, are you wanting to buy some clothing for them?)] #ENDIF

#ELSEIF(pc.isVisiblyPregnant() && pc.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(silvia))

#IF(!pc.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(silvia)) At that moment, the two sisters suddenly notice that you're sporting a swollen, pregnant belly. Telling Silvia that she's the one who knocked you up, you smile as the foxtauress teases, [silvia.speech(It's not my fault; your pussy was just so good, I didn't want to pull out!)] #ELSE At that moment, the two sisters look down at your swollen, pregnant belly. Knowing that she's the one who knocked you up, Silvia smirks and teases, [silvia.speech(Still carrying our kids around, huh?)] #ENDIF

Sensing that there's an opportunity to get some business from you, Fae asks, [fae.speech(Hey, are you wanting to buy some clothing for your kids?)]

#ENDIF

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_elis_market_fae_passionate)) [silvia.speech(Or are you here to try and win another kiss?)] #ELSE [silvia.speech(Or are you here to try and win a kiss?)] #ENDIF Silvia adds, before shyly smiling at you and seductively biting her lip.

[fae.speech(That's right, remember that you get a kiss from each of us if you roll a six on my dice,)] Fae says, before reminding you, [fae.speech(Remember that it costs one 'Faire ticket' for a roll, and you win a prize on a four, five, or six. So, are you going to buy anything, or do you have a ticket to trade in with us?)]

Happily smiling at you, the foxtauress sisters look at you with their blue and green eyes and wait to hear what it is you want...

#ENDIF #ELSE #IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=18)

As it's past closing time, you see a pair of foxtauresses are busily packing their stall away in this area. Not wanting to trouble them, you decide to leave them to it and head back into the Farmer's Market...

#ELSE

Although there are many stalls throughout the Farmer's Market which offer clothing for sale, the one before you is by far the largest and most colourful. Consisting of a long counter covered by a rainbow-coloured, canvas awning, the stall before you is packed full of clothing of all sorts and colours. Looking up, you see that the wooden sign that's attached to the canvas awning displays this stall's name as 'Rainbow's End'.

Looking over the counter, you see that the stall's owners are a pair of orange-furred greater foxtauresses, who each look to be in their early thirties. While both of them stand at [fae.heightValue] and have remarkably similar facial appearances, one of them has bright blue eyes, while the other's are a mossy shade of green.

The green-eyed foxtauress has a head of long, dark brown hair, that's been highlighted with streaks of red dye and tied back into a pony tail by means of a red-and-black scrunchie. She's wearing a black leather jacket, which is unzipped to reveal a dark red crop top, the fabric of which is tightly hugging her [fae.cupSize]-cup breasts. Aside from those three items of clothing, she's wearing nothing else except a significant amount of gold jewellery. Rings in her ears and nose, as well as a gemstone barbell in her navel, are joined by a necklace, a wrist bangle, and an anklet around one of her paws, all in gold. There are even the unmistakable bumps of a pair of nipple barbells pressing out from under her tight crop top.

The blue-eyed foxtauress has hair of a similar length and dark brown shade as her companion, although hers is woven into a braid and dyed with streaks of pink instead of red. She's wearing the same kind of stylish leather jacket as the green-eyed foxtauress, although hers is brown, and instead of a red crop top she's wearing an equally tight-fitting white tube top. The fabric of this top is similarly stretched out by a pair of nipple piercings, although instead of barbells, hers look to be rings. She's wearing a similar amount and style of jewellery as her companion, although instead of gold hers is all silver.

As they see you stop and look at their stall, these foxtauresses exchange a cheeky glance and smirk with one another. Before you can react, they quickly turn around on the spot and flick their huge, fluffy tails aside, shamelessly flashing you their animalistic fox-pussies and assholes. Even without any kind of stimulation, each of their cunts looks to be wet and begging to be fucked. Continuing to look down, you see that these foxtauresses both have a complete set of male genitalia in addition to their female sexes, and from the considerable size of their furry sheaths, you can tell that their cocks must be quite large when erect.

Turning her head back to smile at you, the green-eyed foxtauress winks and teases, [fae.speech(See anything you like, hun? I haven't seen you around before, and my sister and I like to give first timers a bit of a treat... So come on, what do we call you?)]

#ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF

Seeing no reason not to give these exhibitionists your name, you respond to the green-eyed foxtauress and ask her for her name in return. Having had their fun, the two of them drop their tails back down, before turning to face you once again. Clearly being the more confident of the two, the green-eyed foxtauress is again the one to speak, and reveals, [fae.speech(I'm Fae, and this here's my sister Silvia.)]

[silvia.speech(Hi,)] Silvia says, before flashing you a shy smile and batting her eyelids at you.

[fae.speech(So, you're here to buy some clothing, right?)] Fae asks, [fae.speech(We've got a special deal thanks to Elis's tourism board; you buy any item for over five hundred flames, and we give you one 'Faire ticket'! You can trade a ticket in for a roll of a dice, and depending on what you roll, you get a special reward. Better than any old normal clothing shop, right?)]

Curious to know more about these 'special rewards', you ask Fae what you could potentially win from a roll of her dice. Flashing you a smirk, she explains, [fae.speech(You roll a one, two, or three, and you get nothing, I'm afraid. Roll a four and you get a pair of socks, roll a five and you get a cap, and roll a six...)]

[silvia.speech(And you get to kiss us!)] Silvia excitedly interjects, before falling silent and expectedly looking over at her sister.

[fae.speech(That's right, you get a kiss from each of us if you roll a six. You can instead choose to have a ring as your prize, but nobody ever chooses that...)] Fae says, before finishing by revealing, [fae.speech(The tourism board compensates us for all prizes given out, so we really don't mind giving away as many socks, caps, or rings as you can win. Just remember that it costs one 'Faire ticket' for a roll! So, are you going to buy anything, or do you already have any tickets from elsewhere to trade in with us?)]

As you [pc.step] forwards and take a look at what Fae and Silvia have for sale, the green-eyed foxtauress flashes you a grin and asks, [fae.speech(So, what's caught your fancy? Remember, if you spend over five hundred flames, on an item, you get a 'Faire ticket'!)]

Taking your flames in exchange for the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0], Fae pouts and says, [fae.speech(Sorry, [pc.name], but you need to spend at least five hundred flames in order to get a Faire ticket... Why don't you try buying something more expensive?)]

Taking your flames in exchange for the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0], Fae flashes you a happy smile and gives you a small paper Faire ticket, before exclaiming, [fae.speech(Thanks for shopping with us, [pc.name]! You can trade in your ticket for a roll of the dice at any time to try and win a prize!)]

Wanting to take a shot at winning a prize, you place a Faire ticket on the counter and tell Fae that you'd like to have a roll of her dice. The foxtauress's green eyes light up as she hears this, and after taking your ticket and tearing it in half, she hands you her dice and teases, [fae.speech(You're hoping to roll a six, right? Silvia and I could do with a kiss right now...)]

[silvia.speech(That's right,)] Silvia happily nods, before fixing her blue eyes down on the dice in your hand.

#IF(flags.getSavedLong('fae_dice_roll')<4)

Seeing no reason to wait, you give the dice a good shake and roll it onto the counter. The three of you watch as it tumbles across the wooden surface, before bumping off a piece of clothing and clattering to a stop. Looking down at it, you see that it's landed on a [style.italicsMinorBad([style.intFormat([#flags.getSavedLong('fae_dice_roll')])])], meaning that you unfortunately [style.colourMinorBad(win nothing)].

Picking up her dice, Fae consoles you on your loss, [fae.speech(Aww, that's a shame... Better luck next time, [pc.name]! Why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket?)]

#ELSEIF(flags.getSavedLong('fae_dice_roll')==4)

Seeing no reason to wait, you give the dice a good shake and roll it onto the counter. The three of you watch as it tumbles across the wooden surface, before clattering to a sudden stop. Looking down at it, you see that it's landed on a [style.italicsMinorGood(four)], meaning you [style.colourMinorGood(win a pair of socks)].

Picking up her dice, Fae flashes you a big smile and exclaims, [fae.speech(Congratulations, [pc.name]!)]

[silvia.speech(Here you go, [pc.name]. These are the socks that the tourism board supplies us with as a prize,)] Silvia says as she hands you a pair of lime-green socks.

#IF(pc.hasLegs()) As you don't have any feet on which to wear them, you're not exactly sure what to do with this pair of socks, but nevertheless take them from Silvia and thank her for the prize. #ELSE You're not entirely convinced that you'll end up wearing these offensively-coloured socks, but nevertheless take them from Silvia and thank her for the prize. #ENDIF Leaning forwards and flashing you a cheeky smile, Fae asks, [fae.speech(Hey, why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket? I'm sure you'd like to keep rolling until you win a kiss from the two of us, right?)]

#ELSEIF(flags.getSavedLong('fae_dice_roll')==5)

Seeing no reason to wait, you give the dice a good shake and roll it onto the counter. The three of you watch as it tumbles across the wooden surface, before clattering to a stop just before it was about to fall off the edge. Looking down at it, you see that it's landed on a [style.italicsGood(five)], meaning you [style.colourGood(win a cap)].

Picking up her dice, Fae flashes you a big smile and exclaims, [fae.speech(Congratulations, [pc.name]!)]

[silvia.speech(Here you go, [pc.name]. This is one of the caps that the tourism board supplies us with as a prize,)] Silvia says as she hands you a lime-green cap.

You're not entirely convinced that you'll end up wearing this offensively-coloured piece of headgear, but nevertheless take it from Silvia and thank her for the prize. Leaning forwards and flashing you a cheeky smile, Fae asks, [fae.speech(Hey, why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket? I'm sure you'd like to keep rolling until you win a kiss from the two of us, right?)]

#ELSE

Seeing no reason to wait, you give the dice a good shake and roll it onto the counter. The three of you watch as it tumbles across the wooden surface, before eventually clattering to a halt. Looking down at it, you see that it's landed on a [style.italicsExcellent(six)], meaning you've [style.colourExcellent(won either a ring or a kiss from the two foxtauresses)].

Picking up her dice, Fae flashes you a big smile and exclaims, [fae.speech(Congratulations, [pc.name]! Now, do you want some lame old silver ring as your prize...)]

[silvia.speech(Or would you rather get a kiss from each of us?)] Silvia finishes.

With both of the foxtauresses hungrily eyeing you up, you wonder whether to ask for the silver ring or the kiss as your prize...

#ENDIF

Taking a [pc.step] back from the counter, you wonder whether to do as Fae suggests and buy some clothing in order to get another Faire ticket, or instead head off and forget about trying to win #IF(flags.getSavedLong('fae_dice_roll')<4) a prize... #ELSE another prize... #ENDIF

Not being interested in getting a kiss from the two foxtauresses, you tell them that you'd like the ring as your prize. As they hear you say this, both Fae and Silvia pout at you and let out a disappointed whine. Placing her hands on her hips, Fae sighs, [fae.speech(I can't believe that you'd rather have some old ring than getting to kiss us...)]

[silvia.speech(Here you go, [pc.name]...)] Silvia whines as she hands you a silver ring. [silvia.speech(These are what the tourism board gives us to hand out as a prize.)]

Quick to change her attitude, Far leans forwards and flashes you a smile, before aking, [fae.speech(Hey, why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket? I'm sure you're regretting not choosing a kiss, right? You should keep on rolling until you get a six again!)]

Taking a [pc.step] back from the counter, you wonder whether to do as Fae suggests and buy some clothing in order to get another Faire ticket, or instead head off and forget about trying to win another prize...

Not wanting to miss this opportunity, you tell the foxtauresses that you want to kiss them. Their faces light up as they hear you say this, and Fae and Siliva quickly step forwards and lean over the counter in anticipation of what's about to happen. Batting her eyelids, Fae teases, [fae.speech(Come on, [pc.name]. I'll be your first...)]

Moving forwards, you lean in towards Fae, and as you bring your mouth towards hers, she reaches forwards and takes hold of your head, before pulling you in and planting a big, wet kiss on your [pc.lips+]. The scent of delicate perfume surrounds you as the horny foxtauress continues to press her lips against yours, and she lets out a muffled, happy little moan as she kisses you.

[silvia.speech(Come on, Fae, it's my turn now!)] Silvia impatiently declares, before playfully pushing her sister aside. Fae's lips pull away from yours with a loud, wet smacking noise, and before you can do or say anything, Silvia leans forwards and presses her own lips against your mouth. Happily leaning in to you, the blue-eyed foxtauress continues where her sister left off, and plants a series of big, wet kisses on your [pc.lips].

Just as you're really starting to enjoy the experience, Silvia pulls back and sighs, [silvia.speech(You're a good kisser, [pc.name]...)]

With more than a hint of jealousy in her voice, Fae declares, [fae.speech(Well, my kiss was better than yours, Silvia.)]

With the two foxtauresses continuing to lean forwards over the counter, and with their eyes continuing to hungrily roam over your body, you wonder whether to take things further or to end things here...

Having had your fun, you [pc.step] back from the counter and thank Fae and Silvia for the prize. Standing upright once again, Fae flashes you a cheeky smile and asks, [fae.speech(Hey, why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket? I'm sure you'd like to win another kiss from the two of us, right?)]

With the two foxtauresses waiting to hear what your response will be, you wonder whether to do as Fae suggests and buy some clothing in order to get another Faire ticket, or instead head off and forget about trying to win another kiss...

Not yet satisfied, you lean back over towards Fae and once again press your [pc.lips+] against her mouth, before taking hold of her head and starting to passionately kiss her. Her bushy fox-tail excitedly twists around behind her, and with a happy, muffled moan, she desperately returns your kiss. Parting her lips, the foxtauress thrusts her tongue into your mouth and leans even further forwards over her counter in her desperation to make out with you. As her tongue slides over yours, you feel that she's got a barbell piercing through it, and as you experimentally run your tongue over it, she lets out a muffled giggle.

After watching your lewd display for a couple of minutes, Silvia lets out a loud, frustrated sigh, before rudely butting in and pushing her sister away. Before either of you can react, the blue-eyed foxtauress impatiently grabs hold of your head and desperately presses her mouth against yours. Happy to give Silvia a turn, you spend another few minutes making out with her, during which time you discover that she too has a barbell piercing through her tongue. Eventually, at the incessant prompting of her sister, Silvia reluctantly pulls back, bringing an end to your fun.

[fae.speech(We don't get customers like you very often...)] Fae whines, before flashing Siliva a questioning glance. After her sister has given her an approving nod, the green-eyed foxtauress looks back at you and says, [fae.speech(The two of us go to 'The Centaur's Sword' every evening after work. If you want more than just a kiss, then you can find us in there between seven and ten...)]

[silvia.speech(I hope we'll see you in there soon,)] Silvia says, before letting out a playful giggle and asking, [silvia.speech(Did you want to buy anything, [pc.name]? Or if you've got another ticket, then maybe you could roll to earn another kiss...)]

With the two foxtauresses waiting to hear what your response will be, you wonder whether to do as Silvia suggests, or instead say goodbye and take your leave...

#IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=19)

As it's well past closing time, all of the stalls in the Farmer's Market have been packed up and taken away. As a result, there's nothing for you to do here except head back into Elis...

#ELSE

Consisting of a long table and an orange-and-white canvas awning, the stall in front of you bears a large wooden sign that reads 'The Beer Brigade'. As to be expected, this business sells alcoholic beverages, and you're able to see bottles of beer, cider, and perry within the portable arcane refrigeration units that are lined up at the rear of the stall.

#IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=18)

As it's past closing time, the trio of boisterous, broad-shouldered bog-boys who work here are busily packing away their stall. If you wanted to buy anything from them, you'll have to return here tomorrow...

#ELSE

A trio of boisterous, broad-shouldered bog-boys are manning the counter, and as you watch, they call out to the passing crowds, [style.speechMasculine(Cold beers for sale!)]

[style.speechMasculineStrong(Get your perry and cider here!)]

[style.speechMasculine(All locally brewed!)]

Pausing for a moment, you wonder whether to [pc.step] up to the stall and buy a drink from these dog-boys...

#ENDIF #ENDIF

Deciding that you'd like a drink of beer, you [pc.step] up to the counter and order a bottle of 'Canine Crush' from one of the dog-boys behind the counter. After you've handed over the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames asked of you, the dog-boy pops off the cap and hands you the bottle of beer that you've asked for.

Deciding that you'd like a drink of cider, you [pc.step] up to the counter and order a bottle of 'Equine Cider' from one of the dog-boys behind the counter. After you've handed over the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames asked of you, the dog-boy pops off the cap and hands you the bottle of cider that you've asked for.

Deciding that you'd like a drink of perry, you [pc.step] up to the counter and order a bottle of 'Black Stripes Perry' from one of the dog-boys behind the counter. After you've handed over the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames asked of you, the dog-boy pops off the cap and hands you the bottle of perry that you've asked for.

[pc.Stepping] away from the counter, you find a quiet spot in which to relax and drink your alcoholic beverage. After five minutes of watching the crowds of shoppers amble past, you've emptied the entire bottle, and after throwing it away in a nearby recycling bin, you wonder what to do next.

#IF(game.getDayMinutes() + 5 >= 18 * 60) As the time has passed six while you were busy drinking, 'The Beer Brigade' stall is now closed for the day, and you look across to see the three dog-boys packing up. As all of the other stalls in the Farmer's Market will similarly be closed, there's not much for you to do here except head off back into Elis... #ELSE With 'The Beer Brigade' stall still open for business, you hear the three dog-boys behind its counter continuing to call out to passersby. You could always buy another drink if you wanted to, or instead head off into the market once again... #ENDIF

#IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=19)

As it's well past closing time, all of the stalls in the Farmer's Market have been packed up and taken away. As a result, there's nothing for you to do here except head back into Elis...

#ELSE
